reviewText: John Gielgud's performance as Teiresias stunning, and it alone makes this film worth watching. Be aware that this is the last in a set of three films produced by the same team. The other two are (not surprisingly) are "Oedipus the King" and "Oedipus at Colonus". They are difficult to find, but worth the effort.

I saw this way back in the early, early 90's on A&E (I believe). Was shot on video and all on stage, but don't let that discourage you. The acting in this is top notch. I hope that this will become available in the near future. This is a must have if you love great acting.
